name: Synchronized Standstill
description:
Lucille and Robin have always had a special bond - their movements are always identical! When one is stuck, it's like the other has hit a wall too! The pair recently have discovered  a weird phenomena - at the push of a button, they can disconnect, leaving one of them able to move freely and the other frozen! Can they reach the goals, using their unique predicament to their advantage?

Controls:

WASD to move

Go through 5 mazes in this "joined Together" maze puzzle.  :D

Note: There are no sounds in this game
